ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
                
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

正文解密 搜索url 套用6g小说
header: {"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/130.0.0.0"}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content form")
txt=java.getElement("#content@p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	txt=java.getElement("#content@p")
	form=java.getElement("#content form")
	}
if (b=result.match(/function\(\) {\n.*const .+ = '(.*)';\n.*if \(.+ === 'none'\) return;\n.*\n.*const .+ = '(.*)';\n.*const .+ = '(.*)';\n.*const .+ = '.*';\n.*let .+ = '';/)) {
m=b[1]
k=b[2]
b64=b[3]
//java.log(b64)
if(m=='aes'){
	key=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(k)
	//java.log(key)
ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64).slice(16)
iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64).slice(0, 16)
//java.log(iv)
//java.log(ct)
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/Pkcs7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(ct)
	} else if(m=='xor'){
		key=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(k)
		ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64)
		outBytes = [];
  for (let i = 0; i < ct.length; i++) {
    outBytes[i] = ct[i] ^ key[i % key.length];
  }
  txt+=java.bytesToStr(outBytes)
		} else if(m=='base64'){
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		} else if(m=='reverse'){
			ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64)
			reversed = [];
  for (let i = 0; i < ct.length; i++) {
    reversed[i] = ct[ct.length - 1 - i];
  }
  txt+=java.bytesToStr(reversed)
			}} else if (b=result.match(/\s*'(aes|base64|xor|reverse)'\s*,\s*'(.*?)'\s*,\s*'(.*?)'\s*,\s*'.*'/)) {
m=b[1]
k=b[2]
b64=b[3]
//java.log(b64)
if(m=='aes'){
	key=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(k)
	//java.log(key)
ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64).slice(16)
iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64).slice(0, 16)
//java.log(iv)
//java.log(ct)
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/Pkcs7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(ct)
	} else if(m=='xor'){
		key=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(k)
		ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64)
		outBytes = [];
  for (let i = 0; i < ct.length; i++) {
    outBytes[i] = ct[i] ^ key[i % key.length];
  }
  txt+=java.bytesToStr(outBytes)
		} else if(m=='base64'){
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		} else if(m=='reverse'){
			ct=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(b64)
			reversed = [];
  for (let i = 0; i < ct.length; i++) {
    reversed[i] = ct[ct.length - 1 - i];
  }
  txt+=java.bytesToStr(reversed)
			}}result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n或者\n这章解密失败！！！"}
</js>

<js>

    "玄幻魔法",

    "青春校园"
];

let categorys = [];
const status = ["连载", "全本"];

for (let i of status) {
    categorys.push({
        title: i,
        url: `/ranking?status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
        }
    });
    
    for (let j of data) {
        categorys.push({

            url: `/ranking?category=${j}&status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
            }
        });
    }
}

});

for (let j of data) {

            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25

}

});

for (let j of data) {

        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

JSON.stringify(categorys);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var html = java.getString('all');
if(html && /索引文件不存在！/.test(html)){
    java.toast('本章正文缺失');
    result = '本章正文缺失';
} else {
    var txt = java.getString('.word_read@script@html');
    var txt2 = java.getString('.word_read@html');
    if(txt && txt.trim() !== '') {
        try {
            var regex = /<script>document\.writeln\(qsbs\.bb\('([^']+)'\)\);<\/script>/g;
            var matches = [];
            var match;
            var decodedText = "";
            
            while ((match = regex.exec(txt)) !== null) {
                matches.push(match[1]);
            }
            
            if(matches.length > 0) {
                for (var i = 0; i < matches.length; i++) {
                    var base64Str = matches[i];
                    decodedText += java.base64Decode(base64Str); 
                }
                result = decodedText;
            } else {
                result = txt2 || "正文获取失败";
            }
        } catch(e) {
            result = txt2;
        }
    } else {
        result = txt2;
    }
}
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
2025年6月6日更新内容
原版接口关了，现在换了一个网络找的授权版，晴天1.0项目接口现在都是用一个少一个，且用且珍惜！
补充事项:
1.网页版，本身不支持短剧功能，所以本书源就别指望能看短剧了！
2.网页接口存在异常原版支持的听书和漫画功能，现在可能都关了(打开正文全是乱码)！目前本书源只保留，小说功能！(哪怕网页看效果也一样！)
//如正文为链接，返回重进自动切换为听书模式
特别说明
这个限制了日访问量，每天最多看100章，做成书源只是方便阅读，哪怕你在线看也一样！

ruleContent.content:
<js>
r=java.getString(".content@html")
result=r
if (java.getString("text",r)!=""&&r!=""){
	book.type=8
	}
else if (java.getString("text",r)==""&&r!=""){
	book.type=64
	}else if (r==""){
		try{
			if (chapter.index==0){java.toast("如正文为链接，返回重进自动切换为听书模式")}
			book.type=32
			result=src.match(/fetch\('([^']+)'/)[1]
		}catch(e){
			java.log(e)
			result="未找到内容"
			java.toast(result)
			}
	}
result
</js>

ruleContent.content:
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup; var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document; var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element; var document = JsDom.parse(src); // 获取包含

元素的

元素 var dds = document.select('div.content > dd'); // 将dds转换为数组以便排序 var ddArray = []; for (var i = 0; i < dds.size(); i++) { ddArray.push(dds.get(i)); } // 按照data-id属性对ddArray进行排序 ddArray.sort(function(a, b) { var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10); var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10); return pageA - pageB; }); var list = []; var data = { mergedText: "" }; // 遍历排序后的ddArray for (var i = 0; i < ddArray.length; i++) { var dd = ddArray[i]; var dataId = dd.attr('data-id'); // 获取当前dd下的所有

元素的文本内容，保持原有顺序 var paragraphs = dd.select('p'); var paragraphTexts = []; for (var j = 0; j < paragraphs.size(); j++) { var paragraph = paragraphs.get(j); paragraphTexts.push(paragraph.text()); } list.push({ id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性 paragraphs: paragraphTexts // 存储所有

元素的文本内容为数组，保持原有顺序 }); // 合并文本内容，每个

内容后添加换行符，保持原有顺序 data.mergedText += paragraphTexts.join("\n") + "\n"; // 添加额外换行符以便分隔每个dd的内容 } // 输出结果 java.log(JSON.stringify(list)); java.log(data.mergedText); // 返回data对象 result = data.mergedText;

var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#container@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

jsLib:
time = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000).toString()

function getSign (key, type, num) {
  const { java } = this
  const secret = 'magic2019'
  let baseString

  switch (type) {
    case 's':
      baseString = `channel=ft0001&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=0&query=${java.encodeURI(key)}&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 't':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&gid=1&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 'c':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&chapterid=${num}&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    default:
      throw new Error('Invalid type')
  }

  return java.md5Encode(baseString).toUpperCase()
}

cid = java.hexDecodeToString(result)

body = `bid=${bid}&chapterid=${cid}&nsc=1&nci=1&gid=2&channel=ft0001&timestamp=${time}`
java.post(cu, body, {}).body()
</js>

	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["男频"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["女频"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.java.security,
    Packages.java.security.interfaces,
    Packages.java.security.spec,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function encrypt(str){

function a(str) {
	str = String(str);
	length = str.length / 2;
	bArr = [];
	for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
		i2 = i * 2;
		bArr[i] =  intToByte(parseInt(str.substring(i2, i2 + 2), 16));
  }
  return bArr;
}
function intToByte(i) {
	var b = i & 0xFF;var c = 0;
	if (b >= 128) {c = b % 128;c = -1 * (128 - c);}
	else {c = b;}
	return c;
}

 function byteToHexString(arr) {
    return arr.reduce((accu, item) => {
        let a =(item&0xff).toString(16)
        if (a.length ==1) a = "0" + a
        return accu += a
    }, "")
  }
  function hextoBase64(t) {
	function parse(t) {
		t = String(t)
		for (var e = t.length, r = [], i = 0; i < e; i += 2){
		r[i >>> 3] |= parseInt(t.substr(i, 2), 16) << 24 - i % 8 * 4;
		}
		return r;
	}
	function stringify(t) {
		var e = t
		, r = 4 * t.length
		, i = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
		for (var n = [], o = 0; o < r; o += 3){
		    for (var s = (e[o >>> 2] >>> 24 - o % 4 * 8 & 255) << 16 | (e[o + 1 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 1) % 4 * 8 & 255) << 8 | e[o + 2 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 2) % 4 * 8 & 255, a = 0; a < 4 && o + .75 * a < r; a++){
			n.push(i.charAt(s >>> 6 * (3 - a) & 63));}
		}
		var c = i.charAt(64);
		if (c){
		   for (; n.length % 4; ){
			      n.push(c);}
		}
		return n.join("")
	}
	return stringify(parse(t));
}

sf = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
d=hextoBase64(byteToHexString(a(result)));

<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
url = "https://www.sypvm.com/api/search";
r = java.ajax(baseUrl);
s = r.match(/var\s\w+\s*=\s*"\w+";/g).join('');
eval(s);
//java.log(s)
var bd = {
  "method": "POST",
  "body": `q=${key}&vw=${vw}&abw=${abw}&ru=${ru}&jrt=${jrt}&van=${van}&fw=${fw}&cwl=${cwl}&gpr=${gpr}&uyoo=${uyoo}&tz=${tz}&euu=${euu}&tsn=${tsn}&eju=${eju}&um=${um}&fp=${fp}&dvm=${dvm}&jpk=${jpk}&deblkx=${deblkx}&ht=${ht}&azy=${azy}&sna=${sna}&wqx=${wqx}&fpp=${fpp}&rup=${rup}&jwj=${jwj}&bgt=${bgt}&qp=${qp}&yf=${yf}&cw=${cw}&wq=${wq}&sign=${sign}`
};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>

variableComment:
✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)
2  女榜+男榜
3  仅男榜
4  仅女榜
5  旧的发现列表x
✱✱若发现列表没变更，长按列表顶栏，弹出菜单选“刷新”，收起列表再摊开。

//网站地址经常变动
//同站：星空小说http://wap.aixswx.net
header: { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{chapter.title}}|\(第.*页\)|（本章未完.*继续阅读）|阅读.*最新章节.*请关注.+

ruleSearch.author: a@ownText##.*[(]|[):]|[【】].+
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>
.bd li
ruleSearch.name: a@ownText##[()].+|.*[:【]|】

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=java.getElements(".list div");
var li="";
for(i in d){
	li+=d.select(`[data-id=${i}] li`);
	li+="\n";
	}
	li;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page=java.getElement("@@class.pagination@a.0@b.1");
var ys = String(page).match(/\d+/);
var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>

<js>
var dataArray= baseUrl.replace(".html","").split('/')
var aid = dataArray.find(n=>n.includes("bxwx_")).replace("bxwx_","")

var dataArray = []
if(baseUrl.includes(".html")){
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".ph_list")[1].select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
  href:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('href'),
})
})
}else{
 org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".duaejh").select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
 let id=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('onclick')).replace(/read_tz|\(|\)|;/g,"")
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
   href: `/chapter/${aid }/${id}.html`
  })
})
}
result = dataArray
</js>

	list.push(con);
	}
list

<js>
n=result.match(/第1页 \/ 共(\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
var n = parseInt(n);
ul=java.getString('ul a.0@href');
ui=baseUrl.match(/(.*\/\/[^\/]+)\//)[1];

for(var i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	url=ui+String(ul).replace(/page=1/,"page="+i);
	me='第'+i+'页';
	list.push({"text":me,"href":url});
}
list
</js>
